ValidationRule.description: Validates that the form for payment details formating
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Form_of_Payment__c , "SAS Invoice(Name Credit)"), NOT(REGEX( Form_of_Payment_Details__c ,"[A-Z]{2}[0-9]{7}")), FALSE)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Payments Details for SAS Invoice( Name Credit ) format is XX1234567. Two capital letters followed by 7 numbers
